metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24996 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: There is an invalid memory access in the function TextString::~TextString()located in Catalog.cc in Xpdf 4.0.2. It can be triggered by (for example)sending a crafted pdf file to the pdftohtml binary, which allows a remoteattacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly haveunspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ipe package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
